com_addr: 台北市松山區請一律以e-mail應徵
job_desc: Objectives目標 - Start a new Business Unit to promote Spanish Wine 開始推廣西班牙葡萄酒的新業務單位 (無下屬) - Implement a Wine Club among First Super Club Members 在第一名店會員系統中建立所屬葡萄酒俱樂部 - Business Development in selected Large Customers 在選定之大客戶中拓展葡萄酒業務 - Develop and execute yearly activity plan to promote First Mall Portfolio in key wine exhibitions in Taiwan 計劃並執行年度活動，協助第一名店在台灣促銷其西班牙葡萄酒，包含在主要酒展及食品展之葡萄酒促銷- 5 years experience in sales and marketing 至少5年的行銷業務經驗 - Able to interact with foreigners in English 能夠與外國人以英語溝通 - Creative, willing to face challenges, self-managed, outgoing 有創意，願意接受挑戰，自我管理能力佳，且外向 - Enjoys good food and good wine 享受美食美酒，能分辨箇中滋味
